verbose_text: Simultaneously, as shown in XREF_FIG, wherein treated control-6 h was used as a standard, Cur increased the expression of LC3-II and the ratio of LC3-II / LC3-I when HUVECs were exposed to Cur, indicating that Cur induced autophagy in CAs at 6 and 12 h (P < 0.05 and P < 0.01, respectively).
